thread.title: Mavis Staples and Joan Osborne take the stage Sunday

title: Mavis Staples and Joan Osborne take the stage Sunday
text: Mavis Staples and Joan Osborne take the stage Sunday Mavis Staples and Joan Osborne take the stage Sunday Photo provided by Columbia Artists Management – Joan Osborne performs Sunday at Manship Theatre as part of the Solid Soul tour with Mavis Staples. Photo provided by Columbia Artists Management –- Legendary soul singer Mavis Staples performs with Joan Osborne Sunday at Manship Theatre. Photo provided by Columbia Artists Management –- Joan Osborne performs Sunday at Manship Theatre. Photo provided by Columbia Artists Management – Mavis Staples brings her soulful sounds to the Manship Theatre Sunday. She's appearing with Joan Osborne. Solid Soul
